title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 66 - Optometry
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 66 - Optometry

State Regulations
§ 66.1 - Professional study of optometry
§ 66.2 - Professional licensing examination
§ 66.3 - Endorsement
§ 66.4 - Use of diagnostic drugs
§ 66.5 - [Effective until 8/7/2025] Use of therapeutic pharmaceutical agents
§ 66.5 - [Effective 8/7/2025] Use of therapeutic pharmaceutical agents, version 2
§ 66.6 - [Effective until 8/7/2025] Continuing education for licensed optometrists certified to use certain therapeutic pharmaceutical agents. § 66.6 - [Effective 8/7/2025] Continuing education for licensed optometrists certified to use phase one and/or phase two therapeutic pharmaceutical agents, version 2

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. II, subch. B, pt. 66

Statutory authority: Education Law, §§207, 212, 6502, 6504, 6506,6507, 6508, 7101, 7101-a; arts. 130, 131, 133, 135, 139,143, 144, 147, 148, 155, 156, 159; ch. 517, L. 1995

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. § 66.1 - Professional study of optometry
§ 66.2 - Professional licensing examination
§ 66.3 - Endorsement
§ 66.4 - Use of diagnostic drugs
§ 66.5 - Use of therapeutic pharmaceutical agents
§ 66.6 - Continuing education for licensed optometrists certified to use phase one and/or phase two therapeutic pharmaceutical agents
